CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
CurrentVersion.description: Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
OldVersion.description: Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Application Site Creation without Sites.FullControl.All
CurrentVersion.description: Currently an application requires Sites.FullControl.All to create new site collections within a tenant. This work will allow applications to use a new scope, Sites.Create.All, to create new site collections without accessing any existing content. During the site creation process the application can request access to the new site, allowing for provisioning scenarios with reduced tenant permissions. This item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Application Site Creation without Sites.FullControl.All
OldVersion.description: Currently an application requires Sites.FullControl.All to create new site collections within a tenant. This work will allow applications to use a new scope, Sites.Create.All, to create new site collections without accessing any existing content. During the site creation process the application can request access to the new site, allowing for provisioning scenarios with reduced tenant permissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Auto-discarding Sleeping Tabs
CurrentVersion.description: Tabs that have been sleeping for a long time will be discarded to save memory. When a user navigates back to a discarded tab, the tab will need to be reloaded. This can be managed through the AutoDiscardSleepingTabsEnabled policy. This policy will be enabled if the SleepingTabsEnabled policy is enabled.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Auto-discarding Sleeping Tabs
OldVersion.description: Tabs that have been sleeping for a long time will be discarded to save memory. When a user navigates back to a discarded tab, the tab will need to be reloaded. This can be managed through the AutoDiscardSleepingTabsEnabled policy. This policy will be enabled if the SleepingTabsEnabled policy is enabled.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Guided upgrade of applications
CurrentVersion.description: Enterprise Application Management enables you to easily update previously provisioned EAM applications with a securely hosted enterprise catalog.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Guided upgrade of applications
OldVersion.description: Enterprise Application Management enables you to easily update previously provisioned EAM applications with a securely hosted enterprise catalog.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Windows app - New protected virtual printer
CurrentVersion.description: This creates the new virtual printer—OneNote (Desktop) - Protected—for OneNote Windows app, built on top of the Microsoft IPP class print driver. This printer will be compliant and functional with Widows Protected Print (WPP) mode.

OldVersion.title: OneNote: Windows app - New protected virtual printer
OldVersion.description: This creates the new virtual printer—OneNote (Desktop) - Protected—for OneNote Windows app, built on top of the Microsoft IPP class print driver. This printer will be compliant and functional with Widows Protected Print (WPP) mode.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Calendar grid keyboard navigation via arrow keys in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description:
When focused on the calendar grid, you will be able to navigate the time slots on the calendar via left/right/up/down arrow keys in day, week, and work week views. #newoutlookforwindows

While rolling out this feature, we detected an issue specifically affecting Outlook on the Web in the Safari browser. Because of this, we have opted to roll back the existing progression to temporarily remove support for Safari. We have now restarted the rollout and support for Safari is planned to be added by mid-2025.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Calendar grid keyboard navigation via arrow keys in new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description:
When focused on the calendar grid, you will be able to navigate the time slots on the calendar via left/right/up/down arrow keys in day, week, and work week views. #newoutlookforwindows

While rolling out this feature, we detected an issue specifically affecting Outlook on the Web in the Safari browser. Because of this, we have opted to roll back the existing progression to temporarily remove support for Safari. We have now restarted the rollout and support for Safari is planned to be added by mid-2025.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: People Hub improvements in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: In new Outlook for Windows, the People Hub offers a streamlined contacts interface with a single view of each person, automatically linking duplicates and enriching them with organizational profiles. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: People Hub improvements in new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: In new Outlook for Windows, the People Hub offers a streamlined contacts interface with a single view of each person, automatically linking duplicates and enriching them with organizational profiles. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Detailed error description for LMS setup failures
CurrentVersion.description: LMS setup form will now have detailed error description for LMS setup failures.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Detailed error description for LMS setup failures
OldVersion.description: LMS setup form will now have detailed error description for LMS setup failures.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge on MacOS now seamlessly opens links in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: When you set the default browser to Microsoft Edge on MacOS and enable the feature, web links from the Teams desktop app sent via chats, channels, calendar, and other entry points will seamlessly open automatically in the profile that is signed into Teams app and skips the need to reauthenticate in the browser making it faster and easier to access content.  Administrators can control the availability of this feature using the "Choose Which Browser Opens Web Links" Microsoft 365 policy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge on MacOS now seamlessly opens links in Teams
OldVersion.description: When you set the default browser to Microsoft Edge on MacOS and enable the feature, web links from the Teams desktop app sent via chats, channels, calendar, and other entry points will seamlessly open automatically in the profile that is signed into Teams app and skips the need to reauthenticate in the browser making it faster and easier to access content.  Administrators can control the availability of this feature using the "Choose Which Browser Opens Web Links" Microsoft 365 policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): UX Transparency for Web Queries
CurrentVersion.description: With UX transparency of web grounding in Copilot, users will now be able to see the exact queries sent by Copilot in response to a user's prompt to the web for grounding, along with the list of websites being queried, enhancing their awareness over the process.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): UX Transparency for Web Queries
OldVersion.description: With UX transparency of web grounding in Copilot, users will now be able to see the exact queries sent by Copilot in response to a user's prompt to the web for grounding, along with the list of websites being queried, enhancing their awareness over the process.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enable admins to set default document library label based on container label of a group/site/team
CurrentVersion.description: This enables admins to inherit document library label from the container label of a group/site/team. New and edited documents within the default document library will be labeled automatically. If the SharePoint admin had already configured a default document library labeling, this setting will not override it.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enable admins to set default document library label based on container label of a group/site/team
OldVersion.description: This enables admins to inherit document library label from the container label of a group/site/team. New and edited documents within the default document library will be labeled automatically. If the SharePoint admin had already configured a default document library labeling, this setting will not override it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Data export for Viva Glint and Viva Insights data
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow Viva Insights Analyst to download a CSV file containing Viva Glint survey results joined with Viva Insights organizational data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Data export for Viva Glint and Viva Insights data
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow Viva Insights Analyst to download a CSV file containing Viva Glint survey results joined with Viva Insights organizational data.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Forms data sync support in Excel desktop
CurrentVersion.description: Users can get up-to-date form responses data in Excel desktop. Users can also create a new form from Excel desktop with a data sync connection to the Excel workbook.

OldVersion.title: Excel: Forms data sync support in Excel desktop
OldVersion.description: Users can get up-to-date form responses data in Excel desktop. Users can also create a new form from Excel desktop with a data sync connection to the Excel workbook.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Account descriptions
CurrentVersion.description: New Outlook users can now set custom descriptions for their accounts, making them easier to tell apart in the folder list and various lists and menus across the application. The description can be set in the account settings. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Account descriptions
OldVersion.description: New Outlook users can now set custom descriptions for their accounts, making them easier to tell apart in the folder list and various lists and menus across the application. The description can be set in the account settings. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can help monitor response collection and insights
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Forms can now help you monitor and collect responses for your forms, so you can get the data you need with much less effort. Copilot can create a collection plan, track your progress, and let you know when to take action with reminders and insights. Forms can notify you when early insights are ready, and you can easily continue your analysis with Copilot in Excel. Say goodbye to manual follow-ups and hello to smarter collection and analysis.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Forms Copilot can now help you collect responses on your forms
OldVersion.description: Copilot in Forms can now help you monitor and collect responses for your forms, so you can get the data you need on time. Copilot can send invitations, track your progress, and recommend follow-up actions such as reminders. Say goodbye to manual follow-ups and hello to smarter, stress-free data collection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Classification improvements on file read access in MacOS devices using Endpoint Data Loss Prevention
CurrentVersion.description: Data classification on files in MacOS devices will be triggered when handling files on read access to improve classification operations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Classification improvements on file read access in MacOS devices using Endpoint Data Loss Prevention
OldVersion.description: Data classification on files in MacOS devices will be triggered when handling files on read access to improve classification operations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Support for file upload
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Amplify will support authors uploading a file with a list of emails to make it easier for the Outlook channel to reach large audiences.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Support for file upload
OldVersion.description: Viva Amplify will support authors uploading a file with a list of emails to make it easier for the Outlook channel to reach large audiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Feature Access Management for Copilot in Viva Glint
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will have the ability to enable or disable Microsoft 365 Copilot in Viva Glint for specific users through the M365 admin center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Feature Access Management for Copilot in Viva Glint
OldVersion.description: Admins will have the ability to enable or disable Microsoft 365 Copilot in Viva Glint for specific users through the M365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for M365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities in government cloud environments that help secure and govern data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance. These capabilities will be available once Microsoft 365 Copilot is deployed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for M365 Copilot
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities in government cloud environments that help secure and govern data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for M365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities in government cloud environments that help secure and govern data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance. These capabilities will be available once Microsoft 365 Copilot is deployed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for M365 Copilot
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities in government cloud environments that help secure and govern data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams: Send messages to attendees in the meeting lobby with lobby chat
CurrentVersion.description: Now, meeting organizers and co-organizers can send one-way messages to attendees in the lobby via the lobby chat. The Lobby chat is intended to optimize the lobby experience for all participants, ensuring that organizers are better equipped to run external meetings have more control over meetings with external participants, and external attendees are well informed about the meeting upon meeting start.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Add Copilot.cloud.microsoft/Teams/Outlook usage for Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat usage report
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows organizations to monitor Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat adoption in Copilot.cloud.microsoft/Teams/Outlook for users without Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. It enhances the Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat report by providing metrics on the number of active users of Copilot.cloud.microsoft/Teams/Outlook and the last activity date for each user.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - SharePoint storage insights, actions, and resources
CurrentVersion.description: A new Storage tab will be added to usage report for SharePoint within the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new tab will provide visibility into storage quota consumption, a usage trend, and recommended actions and resources for storage management and optimization

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - SharePoint Quota Consumption and recommendations
OldVersion.description: This feature allows organizations to monitor Microsoft 365 SharePoint Quota Consumption and their usage growth over time. It enhances the report by providing single pane access to the above metrics along with recommendations to storage decluttering and storage optimization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - New predicate in Email DLP - Detect number of domains/Recipients
CurrentVersion.description: The "Recipient/Domain Count Over" feature, designed to address a critical need for managing and controlling the distribution of sensitive information via email. This feature allows organizations to set specific policies that trigger alerts or actions when the number of recipients or domains in outgoing emails exceeds a defined threshold. By implementing this feature, organizations can enhance data security, ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, and prevent unauthorized data dissemination, providing peace of mind and safeguarding sensitive information.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Search with apps and agents personalized suggestionss
CurrentVersion.description: We are enhancing Teams search personalized suggestions to include apps and agents. When searching in Teams you will now also get apps and agent suggestions which dynamically update as you type.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control When Shared Content Is Visible to Attendees in 'Manage what attendees see'
CurrentVersion.description: An enhancement to the 'Manage what attendees see' feature, allowing organizers and presenters to control when shared content is visible to attendees. This capability is available for Meetings, Webinars and Town halls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Secure password deployment in the Edge management service
CurrentVersion.description: The secure password deployment feature in the Edge management service enables admins to deploy encrypted shared passwords to a set of users, allowing them to log into websites seamlessly without ever seeing the actual passwords. This reduces the risk of unauthorized access and enhances the organization's overall security posture.

CurrentVersion.title: PowerPoint: Designer is now part of Copilot, enhanced with new template and slide Suggestions.
CurrentVersion.description: Designer is now part of Copilot. Copilot Suggestions now brings you familiar Designer slide layout and presentation template suggestions in a vertical gallery, along with new capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
CurrentVersion.description: Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

CurrentVersion.description: Currently an application requires Sites.FullControl.All to create new site collections within a tenant. This work will allow applications to use a new scope, Sites.Create.All, to create new site collections without accessing any existing content. During the site creation process the application can request access to the new site, allowing for provisioning scenarios with reduced tenant permissions. This item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.  We apologize for any inconvenience.
